department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement of temporary hotel accommodations services in Toronto, starting November 14, 2022.
description: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is requesting bids for the provision of temporary hotel accommodations services to support Ukrainian nationals arriving in Toronto. (see the notice description)

full_summary:
================================

### Tender Notification for Temporary Hotel Accommodations Services

#### Reference Number

WS3636437820-Doc3692981876

#### Solicitation Number

WS3636437820

#### Tender Status

Expired

#### Posting Date

2022-10-03

#### Closing Date and Time

**Modified Closure Time**: November 14, 2022, 16:00 EDST.

#### Background and Scope

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada requires the provision of temporary hotel accommodations services in Toronto from November 14, 2022 to March 31, 2023, with additional optional periods. This tender issuance supersedes all previous information and responses to the solicitation.

#### Description of Services

IRCC seeks temporary accommodations for Ukrainian nationals in Toronto, in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex A - Statement of Requirements. The contractor will provide hotel-style accommodations services to meet the needs of Ukrainian nationals.

#### Evaluation Criteria

A bid must comply with all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive. The responsive bid(s) with the lowest evaluated price for each city and area of city, where applicable, will be recommended for a contract award.

#### Mandatory Requirements

Bidder must meet all requirements outlined in Annex E - Mandatory Requirements. Failure to comply with these mandatory requirements may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to contractors who are authorized to participate in the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

#### Tender Submission and Contact Details

*Contact Information*:
Nathalie Sielatycki (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [nathalie.sielatycki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.sielatycki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: This rewritten entry maintains the mandatory information as specified in the original text. The contact information and publisher details remain the same as the original.
